channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Ether ETF applications flood the SEC as ProShares files the 11th
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: ProShares has filed for an equal weight Bitcoin and Ether ETF, marking the 11th Ether ETF application in less than seven days.

item.title: Coinbase to file order seeking dismissal of SEC lawsuit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Paul Grewal said Coinbase will seek to dismiss the SEC’s suit on Aug. 4 which will argue that it never sold securities as the regulator alleged.

item.title: Block posts 34% increase in Bitcoin revenue in Q2 but shares stumble
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Bitcoin profits on Block’s Cash App dropped slightly from the first quarter of 2023 but remain up 7% from this time last year.

item.title: Curve, Metronome and Alchemix offering 10% bug bounty on Vyper hack
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The exploit on July 30 resulted in the theft of roughly $70 million in cryptocurrencies, bringing the bounty close to $7 million.

item.title: Digital Dollar Project completes CBDC retail remittance pilot with Western Union
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The project simulated transfers to customers of BDO Unibank in the Philippines with improved settlement time, cost and transparency.

item.title: ‘Computer language that anyone can read’ launches Aeternity compiler
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Lexon now features a compiler that allows users to translate code from it to Solidity, Sophia or JavaScript.

item.title: Coinbase Q2 beats estimates amid Blackrock custody deal, institutional focus
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The crypto exchange’s second quarter revenue beat estimates while non-trading revenue surpassed trading revenue.

item.title: Optimism transactions surpass Arbitrum, but what’s behind the uptick in users?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Transactions on Optimism recently eclipsed the Arbitrum network, but do the project’s fundamentals support a sustainable growth trajectory?

item.title: Polygon Zero accuses Matter Labs’ developers of plagiarism
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Polygon Zero has accused Matter Labs of copying significant code from its Plonky2 library to zkSync, a rival Ethereum layer-2 scaling solution.

item.title: Futureverse co-founders launch $50M venture fund
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The AI metaverse company raised $54 million in a Series A round in July.

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting the Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: Could a Bitcoin bull run be triggered by Fitch’s US credit rating downgrade?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Fitch downgraded the U.S. credit rating due to its government debt and potential challenges in handling its fiscal responsibilities. Will Bitcoin’s price benefit from this decision?

item.title: Base launches mainnet bridge UI for end users, sets Aug. 9 for official launch
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Coinbase’s Base network began onboarding end users through a bridge UI, and the team announced Aug. 9 as the platform's official launch date.

item.title: Worldcoin: Should you let Sam Altman scan your eyeballs for WLD?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By J.W. Verret
item.description: Sam Altman believes his product ChatGPT will disrupt the world. As a “solution” to the consequences, he’s asking you to scan your eyeballs with his new Orb.

item.title: The Sandbox implements KYC measures for protocol staking
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Unverified users can still withdraw staked SAND but will be unable to make further deposits.

item.title: How will Bitcoin halving affect BTC price, and is DeFi dead?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ray Salmond
item.description: Blockware Solutions account executive David Gamble told Market Talks host Ray Salmond that the crypto market will hit a $10 trillion market cap in the next few years.

item.title: Curve’s crvUSD depegs as market reacts to shock events
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The decentralized stablecoin is facing its first stress test since it was released in May, putting its PegKeeper algorithm to work.

item.title: Unibot maintains first-mover status among Telegram crypto trading bots
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.description: The Unibot price could be overextended, but notable user base growth and real yields paid to tokenholders are a reflection of the project’s strong fundamentals.

item.title: Agence France-Presse sues Elon Musk and X/Twitter over compensation for news
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: If the suit is successful, X will have to turn over data in order for AFP to determine how much compensation it will seek.

item.title: Individual charged with money laundering admits to hacking Bitfinex in 2016: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The identity of the hacker or hackers behind an exploit that removed more than 100,000 Bitcoin from Bitfinex in 2016 had only been the subject of speculation until Aug. 3.

item.title: NY Times defends article on Caroline Ellison: The public has a ‘legitimate interest’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The media outlet claimed the public and press had a right to receive information on a “central participant in a financial scheme that defrauded investors of billions of dollars.”

item.title: BTC price risks new sub-$29K dip as Binance fears test Bitcoin bulls
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin is not done with short-term BTC price downside, analysis predicts, with overall volatility still among its lowest-ever levels.

item.title: Web3 Gamer: Zuckerberg’s metaverse losses, NFT game on Discord, Gods Unchained hot take
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Erhan Kahraman
item.description: Instagram CEO Zuckerberg’s $40B metaverse losses, AI-powered NFT RPG on Discord, new Web3 eSports platform and a hot take on Gods Unchained.

item.title: Upbit exchange overtakes Coinbase and OKX in trading volume
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: In the month of July, Upbit outperformed both Coinbase and OKX in terms of spot trading volume for the first time.

item.title: Alibaba releases two open-sourced AI models to rival Meta’s Llama 2
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The Chinese tech and e-commerce giant Alibaba revealed two new open-sourced AI models, Qwen-7B and Qwen-7B-Chat, to rival Meta’s recently-launched Llama 2.

item.title: Aave Chan founder proposes buying $2M in CRV from Curve founder
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The proposal drew mixed reactions from the community, with some criticizing the strategy for buying more CRV even as others are looking to shed exposure.

item.title: How liquid staking can potentially harm the Ethereum ecosystem: HashKey report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: HashKey Capital highlighted risks such as reduced competition, increased risk of censorship, decreased security and collusion by big players.

item.title: Huobi’s Jun Du acquires 10 million CRV tokens to support Curve
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Du said the existing challenges were transitory and that he believes the industry would benefit from collective support.

item.title: NFT gas usage shows downward trend, signals shift in landscape
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Despite a surge in Ether gas prices in May, NFT marketplaces only accounted for 3% of the entire Ethereum gas consumption.

item.title: How to use Microsoft Power BI
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Learn how Power BI unlocks the potential of your data and is useful for data visualization and analysis.
